original_text: So Jacob's sons did what Pharaoh said. Joseph gave them carts as Pharaoh had told him to do. He also gave them food for their journey.
korean_text: 이스라엘의 아들들이 그대로 할새 요셉이 바로의 명령대로 그들에게 수레를 주고 길 양식을 주며

sentences.original_text: So Jacob's sons did what Pharaoh said.
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 야곱의 아들들은 바로가 말한 대로 행했습니다.

sentences.original_text: as Pharaoh had told him to do.
